Sentencas: The solid solutions of CeO2 with one or more rare-earth oxides among Yb2O3, Sm2O3, and Gd2O3 are synthesized by either modified glycine nitrate procedure (MGNP) or self-propagating reaction at room temperature (SPRT).
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The overall mole fraction of rare-earth oxide dopants was x = 0.2.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The characterization was committed by XRPD, TEM, BET, and Raman Spectroscopy methods.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: According to XRPD and Raman spectroscopy, the obtained products presented the single-phase solid solutions with basic fluorite-type CeO2 structure, regardless on the number and the concentration of dopants.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both XRPD and TEM analysis evidenced the nanometer particle dimensions.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The defect model was applied to calculate lattice parameters of single-, co-, and multi-doped solids.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sintering of the sample nanopowders was performed at 1550 A degrees C, in air atmosphere.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sintered samples were characterized by XRPD, SEM, and complex impedance methods.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sintering did not affect the concentration ratios of the constituents.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The highest conductivity at 700 A degrees C amounting to 2.14 x 10(-2) and 1.92 x 10(-2) Omega(-1) cm(-1) was measured for the sample Ce0.8Sm0.08Gd0.12O2-delta, synthesized by SPRT and MGNP methods, respectively.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The corresponding activation energies of conductivity, measured in the temperature range 500-700 A degrees C, amounted to 0.24 and 0.23 eV.
Titulo: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties of doped ceria as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
